data.title: Other educational programs - Carlos Slim Foundation
data.meta_description: Other educational programs - Carlos Slim Foundation |
data.text:
This scholarship offers outstanding students the opportunity of studying two-years master’s degree programs at the University George Washington, collaborating with institutions in the public and private sectors, interacting with political leaders and committing to professional practices, in order to empower them as future leaders of Mexico.

Objective

Our objective is granting academic scholarships to support Mexican students to do a master’s degree in George Washington University, in order to empower them as future leaders of Mexico.

Results

So far, 9 master’s degree scholarships were awarded for the 2013-2016 generation.

CARLOS SLIM SCHOLARSHIPS IN HEALTH

This program grants scholarships for students of excellence in the areas of medicine, nursing and nutrition.

Results
